text: , son of Kanetsune, was a kugyō or Japanese court noble of the early Kamakura period. He held a regent position kampaku from 1267 to 1268. and Iemoto were his sons. One of his daughter was a consort of regent Takatsukasa Kanetada. ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1246 births Category:1268 deaths Category:People of Kamakura-period Japan
title: Konoe Motohira
